questions.question: What is the primary role of an Ethical Hacker (White Hat)?
options: Exploit vulnerabilities for personal gain
Use their skills to improve security by testing systems for weaknesses
Expose vulnerabilities without permission
Steal data or deploy malware
questions.answer: Use their skills to improve security by testing systems for weaknesses

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a responsibility of a cybersecurity expert?
options: Implementing tools and strategies to safeguard against hacking
Monitoring systems for suspicious activity
Creating security protocols and training staff
Collecting and interpreting data to help organizations make informed decisions
questions.answer: Collecting and interpreting data to help organizations make informed decisions

questions.question: What is the main task of a data analyst?
options: Monitoring posts and comments in online communities
Gathering, processing, and interpreting data to support decision-making
Maintaining and configuring computer systems and networks
Creating engaging and authentic posts on social media
questions.answer: Gathering, processing, and interpreting data to support decision-making

questions.question: Which role is responsible for maintaining order in online communities?
options: System Administrator
Moderator
Influencer
Cybersecurity Expert

questions.question: What is a key responsibility of an influencer?
options: Installing and updating operating systems
Building relationships by interacting with followers
Monitoring network performance
Investigating breaches and restoring compromised systems
questions.answer: Building relationships by interacting with followers

questions.question: Which of the following tasks is NOT typically performed by a system administrator?
options: Configuring firewalls and monitoring network performance
Assisting users with technical issues
Managing data backups and recovery
Producing engaging and authentic posts on social media
questions.answer: Producing engaging and authentic posts on social media
